body_html:
@gaussic in centos I get
$ ls /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/
ls: cannot access /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/: No such file or directory

what do you suggest?

update:
I have this
ls /usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-redhat-linux/4.8.5/libstdc++.so
/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-redhat-linux/4.8.5/libstdc++.so
but not libstdc++.so.6 now, what should I do?

body:
@gaussic in centos I get 
$ ls /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/
ls: cannot access /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/: No such file or directory

what do you suggest?

---
update:
I have this
ls /usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-redhat-linux/4.8.5/libstdc++.so

but not libstdc++.so.6 now, what should I do?
